meanings.sent1: I accidentally hit the wrong key and had to overwrite my entire essay.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to save your work before you overwrite any important files.
meanings.sent3: I tried to overwrite my shopping list with a recipe, but now I can't remember what I needed to buy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter seemed to overwrite the tension in the room, making everyone relax.
meanings.sent5: The artist decided to overwrite the original sketch with bold, new strokes.

meanings.definition: Replace existing data with new data.
meanings.sent1: If you want to update the spreadsheet, you will need to overwrite the old numbers with the new ones.
meanings.sent2: Remember to overwrite the outdated information with the most recent statistics.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally hit the wrong button and ended up trying to overwrite my grocery list with a funny cat video.
meanings.sent4: The storm seemed to overwrite the peaceful scene with chaos and destruction.
meanings.sent5: The new manager decided to overwrite the old policies with more modern and efficient ones.

meanings.definition: To record or copy new data over existing data.
meanings.sent1: You can easily overwrite the old file by saving the new version in the same location.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to accidentally overwrite the important data with the wrong information.
meanings.sent3: I tried to overwrite my friend's phone number with a funny emoji, but now I can't reach them.
meanings.sent4: Her bright smile seemed to overwrite the gloomy mood in the room, bringing a sense of joy.
meanings.sent5: The new software update will automatically overwrite the previous version to ensure smooth operation.
